Package xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options

Class PubOption

java.lang.Object
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options.PubOption
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractedPubOption, PubDisableAllowedOption, PubOptionWithValue
public abstract sealed class PubOption extends Object implements Cloneable permits AbstractedPubOption, PubDisableAllowedOption<D>, PubOptionWithValue<V>
An entity of the option which uses for apply it in the subcommand.
